    Methods in nl.han.ica.oopg.alarm with parameters of type IAlarmListener
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Alarm.addTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
    Add a new object that implements the IAlarmListener interface to listen to the alarm.
    void Alarm.removeTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
    Remove a object that implements the IAlarmListener interface from the alarm to stop listening.
